content:
OutputMessageType Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of output message as either an error, warning, or informational.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public enum OutputMessageType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
OutputMessageType
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Fields

Error

Indicates an error.
Info

Indicates an informational message.
Warning

Indicates a warning.
